Detailed Description

Class to be used when creating the SearchMapRegionTable in the MapModule.

Member Function Documentation

uint32 WriteableSearchMapRegionTable::addRegionCombo (  const set< uint32 > &  combo  ) 
 

Adds the combination to the region table and returns and index into the table which can be used to retreive the information again.

Parameters:
nbrRegions The number of regions to add.
regions Pointer to the first region to add.
Returns:
An index in the table.

Referenced by WriteableSearchMapStringTable::addStringCombo().

Member Data Documentation

lookupTable_t WriteableSearchMapRegionTable::m_lookupTable [private]
 

Structure used to speed up the adding and avoiding linear searches.

The region combination is in first and the index of it is in second. The structures in the ordinary SearchMapRegionTable should also always be updated.

Definition at line 188 of file SearchMapRegionTable.h.

uint32 WriteableSearchMapRegionTable::m_nbrAllocatedRegions [private]
 

Number of regions that have been allocated so far.

This variable does not exist in the non-writeable version, since it should not be expanded.
